shopifyProduct.title: Lavender Loofah
shopifyProduct.descriptionHtml:
Key ingredients: Lavender Essential Oil, Fair Trade Organic Jojoba Oil, Glycerin, Lavender flowers.

Â 

A refreshing and floral aroma comes straight from a lavender farm. Lavender essential oil is popular for soothing and multiple beneficial purposes. It is also antibacterial, antiseptic and a natural insect repellent. The 100% natural soap bar looks great by your sink and feels even better on the skin.

Best for: Relaxing, antiseptic, antibacterial and moisturizing.






We are 100% Handmade in Toronto, Canada! We are proud to be doing what we love since 2004. We make everything in small batches in our Liberty Village studio. We focus on using the highest quality ingredients and providing a vast selection for every needs.
